PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Pengaturan Profil
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AVATAR_DELETE_FAILED: Terjadi kesalahan saat menghapus avatar, silakan coba lagi
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Profil Anda telah berhasil diperbarui, silakan masuk lagi dengan data akun yang baru diubah

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profil
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Alamat email Anda adalah identitas Anda dan digunakan untuk masuk.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Pintasan keyboard untuk mengirim pesan
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: Anda dapat memilih pintasan keyboard (baik Enter atau Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) berdasarkan preferensi Anda dalam menulis.

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Kirim pesan dengan menekan tombol Enter daripada mengklik tombol kirim.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Kirim pesan dengan menekan tombol Cmd/Ctrl + Enter daripada mengklik tombol kirim.

INTERFACE_SECTION.TITLE: Interface
INTERFACE_SECTION.NOTE: Customize the look and feel of your Chatwoot dashboard.

FONT_SIZE.TITLE: Font size
FONT_SIZE.NOTE: Adjust the text size across the dashboard based on your preference.
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your font settings have been updated successfully
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the font settings, please try again

LANGUAGE.TITLE: Preferred Language
LANGUAGE.NOTE: Choose the language you want to use.
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your Language settings have been updated successfully
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the language settings, please try again

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Tanda tangan pesan pribadi
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a unique message signature to appear at the end of every message you send from any inbox. You can also include an inline image, which is supported in live-chat, email, and API inboxes.
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.API_ERROR: Tidak dapat menyimpan tanda tangan! Coba lagi
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: Image added successfully. Please click on save to save the signature

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Tanda Tangan Pesan
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.ERROR: Tanda Tangan Pesan tidak boleh kosong
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE.PLACEHOLDER: Masukkan tanda tangan pesan pribadi Anda di sini.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Kata Sandi
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Memperbarui kata sandi Anda akan mengatur ulang login Anda di beberapa perangkat.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Token Akses
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Token ini dapat digunakan jika Anda sedang membangun integrasi berbasis API
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_ERROR: Unable to regenerate access token. Please try again

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Audio Alerts
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Enable audio alerts in dashboard for new messages and conversations.

ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NONE: You haven't selected any options, you won't receive any audio alerts.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for any unassigned conversations.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for your assigned conversations and any unattended ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you and to others, but not for unassigned ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for unattended conversations and those assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for all conversations.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Kondisi pemberitahuan:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Kirim pemberitahuan audio hanya jika jendela browser tidak aktif
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Kirim pemberitahuan setiap 30 detik hingga semua percakapan yang ditetapkan dibaca

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SOUND_PERMISSION_ERROR: Autoplay is disabled in your browser. To hear alerts automatically, enable sound permission in your browser settings or interact with the page.

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Notifikasi Email
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Perbarui preferensi notifikasi email Anda di sini
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Kirim notifikasi email saat percakapan ditugaskan kepada saya
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Kirim notifikasi email ketika percakapan baru dibuat
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Kirim notifikasi email saat Anda disebut dalam percakapan
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim notifikasi email ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang telah ditugaskan
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim notifikasi email ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang Anda ikuti
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send email notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notification preferences

TYPES.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED: A conversation is assigned to you
TYPES.CONVERSATION_MENTION: You are mentioned in a conversation
TYPES.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in an assigned conversation
TYPES.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in a participating conversation
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: A conversation misses first response SLA
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: A conversation misses next response SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.BROWSER_PERMISSION: Enable push notifications for your browser so you’re able to receive them

API.UPDATE_ERROR: Terjadi kesalahan saat memperbarui preferensi, silakan coba lagi

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Notifikasi Push
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Perbarui preferensi notifikasi push Anda di sini
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Kirim notifikasi push ketika percakapan ditugaskan kepada saya
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Kirim notifikasi push ketika percakapan baru dibuat
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Kirim notifikasi push ketika Anda disebut dalam percakapan
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim notifikasi push ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang telah ditugaskan
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Kirim notifikasi push ketika pesan baru dibuat dalam percakapan yang Anda ikuti
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: Anda telah mengaktifkan notifikasi push untuk browser ini.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send push notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_SHORT: Automatically mark offline when you aren't using the app.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Pembayaran
BILLING_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your subscription here, upgrade your plan and get more for your team.

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Paket Saat Ini
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: Anda saat ini berlangganan paket **{plan}** dengan **{quantity}** lisensi

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Kelola langganan Anda
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: Lihat faktur sebelumnya, edit rincian pembayaran, atau batalkan langganan Anda.

CAPTAIN.TITLE: Captain
CAPTAIN.DESCRIPTION: Manage usage and credits for Captain AI.
CAPTAIN.UPGRADE: Captain is not available on the free plan, upgrade now to get access to assistants, copilot and more.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Butuh bantuan?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Mengalami masalah dalam pembayaran? Kami di sini untuk membantu.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Akun pembayaran Anda sedang dikonfigurasi. Silakan segarkan halaman dan coba lagi.

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! Kami tidak dapat menemukan akun Chatwoot apa pun. Harap buat akun baru untuk melanjutkan.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Tidak dapat terhubung ke Server Woot, Silakan coba lagi nanti

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: Pindah ke tab berikutnya dalam daftar percakapan

HEADER.TITLE: Agent assignment
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Define policies to effectively manage workload and route conversations based on the needs of inboxes and agents. Learn more here

ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.TITLE: Assignment policy
ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Manage how conversations get assigned in inboxes.
FEATURES: Assign by conversations evenly or by available capacity
Add fair distribution rules to avoid overloading any agent
Add inboxes to a policy - one policy per inbox

AGENT_CAPACITY_POLICY.TITLE: Agent capacity policy
FEATURES: Create exceptions based on labels and time
Add agents to a policy - one policy per agent

CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.TITLE: Add inbox
CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {inboxName} inbox is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove inbox from policy

BALANCED.LABEL: Balanced
BALANCED.DESCRIPTION: Assign conversations based on available capacity.

EARLIEST_CREATED.LABEL: Earliest created
EARLIEST_CREATED.DESCRIPTION: The conversation that was created first gets assigned first.

LONGEST_WAITING.LABEL: Longest waiting
LONGEST_WAITING.DESCRIPTION: The conversation waiting the longest gets assigned first.

FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.LABEL: Fair distribution policy
FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum number of conversations that can be assigned per agent within a time window to avoid overloading any one agent. This required field defaults to 100 conversations per hour.

INBOXES.LABEL: Added inboxes
INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Add inboxes for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select inboxes to add

INBOXES.EMPTY_STATE: No inboxes added to this policy, add an inbox to get started

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy
Failed to create agent capacity policy

CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Add agent
CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {agentName} is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to update agent capacity policy

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove agent from policy

EXCLUSION_RULES.LABEL: Exclusion rules
EXCLUSION_RULES.DESCRIPTION: Conversations that satisfy the following conditions would not count towards agent capacity

TAGS.LABEL: Exclude conversations tagged with specific labels

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select tags to add

TAGS.EMPTY_STATE: No tags added to this policy.

DURATION.LABEL: Exclude conversations older than a specified duration

USERS.LABEL: Assigned agents
USERS.DESCRIPTION: Add agents for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select agents to add

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

DELETE_POLICY.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to delete agent capacity policy

DELETE_POLICY.TITLE: Delete policy
DELETE_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this policy? This action cannot be undone.
